pages.text: 18|5|e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i ebam tadera pitrpurusadera'o chila na. Tadera mukha theke bera ha'oya bakya ki sanghatika! Tara to sudhu mithya'i bale [1].
18|6|Tara e banite imana na anale sambhabata tadera pichane ghure apani duhkhe atma-binasi haye parabena [1].
18|7|Niscaya yaminera upara ya kichu ache amara seguloke tara sobha karechi [1], manusake e pariksa karara jan'ya ye, tadera madhye kaje ke srestha.
18|8|Ara tara upara ya kichu ache ta abasya'i amara udbhidasun'ya mayadane parinata karaba [1].
18|9|Apani ki mane karena ye, kahapha [1] o rakimera [2] adhibasira amadera nidarsanabalira madhye bismayakara [3]

18|10|yakhana yubakara guhaya asraya nila takhana tara balechila, ‘he amadera raba! Apani nija theke amaderake anugraha dana karuna ebam amadera jan'ya amadera kajakarma sathikabhabe paricalanara byabastha karuna [1].
18|11|Atahpara amara taderake guhaya kayeka bachara ghumanta abasthaya rakhalama [1]
18|12|pare amara taderake jagiye dilama janara jan'ya ye, du’dalera madhye konati? [1] Tadera abasthitikala sathikabhabe nirnaya karate pare.

18|13|Amara apanara kache tadera brttanta sathikabhabe barnana karachi; tara to chila kayekajana yubaka [1], tara tadera rabera upara imana enechila [2] ebam amara tadera hidayata brd'dhi kare diyechilama [3]

18|14|ara amara tadera citta drrha kare dilama; tara yakhana uthe damrala takhana balala, ‘amadera raba. Asamanasamuha o yaminera raba. Amara kakhana'i tamra paribarte an'ya ilahake dakaba na; yadi daki, tabe ta habe khuba'i gar'hita katha.

18|15|‘Amadera e sbajatira, tara tamra paribarte aneka ilaha grahana kareche. Era esaba ilaha sambandhe spasta pramana upasthita kare na kena? Ata'eba ye allah sambandhe mithya udbhabana kare tamra ceye adhika jalema ara ke
